title.narrative: Media Sector Development Program (MSDP) in the Democratic Republic of Congo

description.narrative: (Democratic Republic of the Congo): The Media Sector Development Program (MSDP), implemented by Internews Network, promotes an independent, objective, professional, and sustainable media sector in the DRC. The activity improves the quality of journalism and news production, and enhances the management capacity of community radio stations and local radio networks in target provinces by providing training in marketing and financial management, mentoring, technical assistance, and material support. The activity also strengthens the legal framework supporting media at the national level and advocates for media regulatory reform.By the end of MSDP in 2015, targeted community radio stations and networks will have enhanced management and financial systems, as well as improved reporting and news production. In addition modifications to legislation and regulations upholding press freedoms and protections are expected to be introduced in Parliament.
